pullrequest.title: Component for converting between eigen3 and ignition-math (part of #19)

content.raw:
We can definitely do much better than this in terms of conversion functions (and I say that as the person who wrote this file).

I think the header-only aspect is fine, maybe even preferable. It'll give us a chance to explore exporting header-only libraries.
content.html:
We can definitely do much better than this in terms of conversion functions (and I say that as the person who wrote this file).

I think the header-only aspect is fine, maybe even preferable. It'll give us a chance to explore exporting header-only libraries.
